title: Constructivist-Based Mathematical Practical Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic arithmetic and fundamental algebraic concepts
context.additional_context: Course for in-service professionals to learn mathematics application in the workplace, emphasizing knowledge construction through collaborative learning and real-life problem-solving

learning_goals: Learners can explain mathematical modeling processes with ≥80% accuracy by analyzing real-world work cases
Learners collaboratively propose ≥3 creative problem-solving strategies while addressing complex mathematical problems with peers
Learners can create a portfolio demonstrating cases where mathematical concepts are applied to practical situations through project deliverables.
Learners can systematically document their learning process and knowledge construction methods through reflective journaling.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
